fillFields: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
featureLeft1Desc: We provide premium services to ensure a comfortable experience.
featureLeft2Desc: Our team is available around the clock for your assistance.
featureRight1Desc: Enjoy high-quality services at the most affordable rates.
featureRight2Desc: We offer free pick-up and drop-off for your convenience.

about.title: Central
about.subtitle: About
about.description: VolanGo is a forward-thinking transportation company focused on delivering convenient, safe, and affordable rides to users everywhere. We aim to revolutionize urban mobility by providing a seamless experience through technology, offering both efficiency and sustainability. Our goal is to make travel simple, accessible, and environmentally friendly for all. We prioritize customer satisfaction and safety in every journey we provide.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To revolutionize urban transportation by creating a seamless, sustainable, and user-friendly experience for travelers everywhere.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide safe, affordable, and reliable rides that prioritize convenience, customer satisfaction, and environmental responsibility.

about.additional: Did you know that VolanGo's eco-friendly ride options help reduce your carbon footprint, making every journey a step towards a greener future? So, you’re not just getting from point A to point B—you’re helping the planet too!

phoneReservationDescription: Reserve your car quickly and easily with just a call to our customer service team, no app needed.
specialRatesDescription: Enjoy exclusive discounts and special offers tailored to your travel needs and budget.
oneWayRentalDescription: Pick up your car at one location and drop it off at another, with no extra hassle.
lifeInsuranceDescription: Drive with peace of mind knowing you’re covered with our comprehensive life insurance options.
cityToCityDescription: Travel seamlessly between cities with our reliable and convenient city-to-city car rental service.
freeRidesDescription: Enjoy the added benefit of free rides to and from the rental location with our convenient service.
vehicleCategoriesDescription: Explore our range of vehicles to suit every need, from city cars to luxury rides.
sectionDescription: VolanGo is known for its simple and quick car rental process, making it easy for users to get the car they need in just three steps.
comeInContact: Choose the date and car type
comeInContactDescription: Simply select your desired date and car model, whether it's for a short trip or a longer journey.
chooseACar: Add the car to your cart
chooseACarDescription: Once you've made your selection, just add the car to your cart for an easy and organized booking process.
enjoyDrivingDescription: Finish your booking by choosing your preferred payment method, and you're ready to hit the road with no hassle.
blogDescription: Welcome to the VolanGo Blog, your source for tips, updates, and travel advice. Here, you'll find everything from car rental tips to eco-friendly travel options. Stay tuned for news and insights to make your VolanGo experience even better.
rentalFinesTitle: Rental Cars: I want to rent a BMW
rentalFinesDescription: I'm thinking about renting a BMW for my next trip. How does the driving experience compare to other luxury cars in your fleet.
rentalCostTitle: Rental Cars: I want to rent a Mercedes
rentalCostDescription: I’ve always loved Mercedes cars! Does VolanGo offer any specific Mercedes models with advanced tech features for a more comfortable ride.
requiredDocsDescription: I'm new to renting cars with VolanGo. Can you explain how I can choose the best car for my needs, especially for a long road trip.
dontHesitateMessage: Don't hesitate and send us a message.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: VolanGo is your go-to app for quick, hassle-free, and eco-friendly car rentals—where convenience meets adventure.

intro.title: Contact Us
intro.message: The contact form is currently inactive. Get a functional and working contact form with Ajax & PHP in a few minutes. Just copy and paste the files, add a little code and you're done.

vehicleDescription: Explore just a peek of our diverse vehicle categories, from sleek luxury cars to spacious SUVs and eco-friendly options. Whether you're looking for style, comfort, or practicality, we’ve got the perfect ride for every occasion. Start your journey with VolanGo and choose the car that suits your needs.

carousel.heading1: Get 15% off your rental! Choose Your Model
carousel.heading2: Get 15% off your rental Plan your trip now
